verbose_text: Considerable amounts of DARPin 8h6 were detected in tumours even after 72 h (1.5% +/- 0.3% of the injected dose, compared to 5.4% +/- 0.7% at 3 h, as determined from the fluorescence ratio of the tumour tissue and the injected DARPin 8h6-Cy5.5 solution (average radiant fluorescence = 8.3 x 10 9 (p/s/cm2/sr) / (muW / cm2))), indicative of substantial DARPin uptake by cells in the tumour microenvironment.
